Gain a +10 to all Focus Power tests.
Gain a +10 to all Logic and Lore tests.
Take an immediate half action and regain your reaction upon falling below 25% wounds, up to once per encounter.
Once per round, you may make a +20 Perception test on a target as a free action. On a success, gain knowledge of its current armor and wounds.

Gain a +20 bonus to Toughness tests made to resist airborne toxins and gas, and can hold breath twice as long.

Always considered Lightly Damaged, and heals at an increased rate, removing 2 points of damage per day instead of 1.

Allows the wearer to transport roughly 30 kg of extra weight, but removing an object from the pack requires a Full Action.
A pair of handcuffs. Useful for restraining and inhibiting movement.

Can remove most distance-based penalties to Perception skill tests.

A mask with an external supply tank that stores and recycles breathable air. The wearer is immune to toxic atmospheres and can breathe underwater.
A character wearing one gains a +30 bonus to any Toughness test made to resist the effects of gas, and may reroll the test if failed.
Can be fired with a Ballistic Skill test to attach to a surface within 30m. As a Half Action, an attached Wire Gun can be retracted, moving the user 15m.
Wearing and activating NVGs in darkness means the wearer no longer suffers darkness-based vision penalties.
Jams outgoing brainchip communication data within a 150 meter radius of handheld device.
Tests to hear the weapon are made at a -20, and are audible only at half the normal distance. Applicable to any Light or Basic solid projectile weapon.
1/2 weight, mag size, and range. Dmg -1. Tests suffer a -20 to attempt to find the weapon. Applicable to any ranged laser, solid projectile, bolt, or plasma weapon of Basic class.
Ignore penalties for Long and Extreme range after Full Action aim. Applicable to any ranged laser, solid projectile, bolt, or plasma weapon of Basic class.
Can brace weapon on any reasonably flat surface. Bipod 90 deg. fire arc, tripod 180 deg. Applicable to any Basic or Heavy ranged weapon.
Increase mag size by half (rounded up). Applicable to any ranged weapon.
Mag size x5, can't be reloaded in combat. Applicable to any bolt, flame, las, melta, plasma, and solid projectile weapon.
Only allows a verified user to fire the weapon. Applicable to any weapon.
Grants +2 bonus to half action aim, +4 bonus to full action aim. Applicable to any weapon.
Gain +10 to BS when firing single shot. Applicable to any ranged laser, solid projectile, bolt, or plasma weapon of the Basic class.
Disallows firing on friendly targets as specified by the Org-Lock maintainer. Applicable to any ranged weapon.
Grants +5 to BS or WS for owner, -5 to all others. Applicable to any weapon.

When using semi-auto burst, counts as scoring one additional DoS. Applicable to any ranged weapon capable of semi-automatic fire.
45m range w/ dmg and pen of the loaded grenade. Can't reload during combat. Applicable to any laser, solid projectile or Basic bolt weapon.
Protects any elecronic components of the weapon from electromagnetic pulse (EMP) attacks. Applicable to any weapon.
Grants +10 to BS to semi-auto burst or full auto. Applicable to any ranged weapon.
No penalties due to smoke/darkness, and +20 bonus to perception test in the dark. Applicable to any basic laser, solid projectile, bolt, or plasma weapon.
Combines benefits of thermal sight, laser sight, and telescopic sight. Applicable to any ranged laser, solid projectile, bolt, or plasma of basic class.

Adds 3 to weapon pen. Kinetic weapons only.

Adds the Hallucinogenic (2) and Recharge qualities. Bolt and kinetic weapons.

Increases AP of the mounted Hit Location by 3.

Ignore penalties for Long and Extreme range after Full Action aim.
The nearest Weapon Slot may ignore Location requirements for its weapon system.

You are aware of the Armor values and System Slots of any mech of rarity Rare or lower. May make a +20 Perception test to determine the Armor values of any opponent.
Gain +10 to BS when firing a ranged weapon single shot.
As a Half Action, attack with a Standard Attack, Semi-Auto Burst, or a Full Auto Burst with a number of weapons equal to your Ballistic Skill bonus.
